Title: Bang!
Writer: Georg Oddner, Sven Christer Swahn (novel), Sven Christer Swahn (screenplay), Jan Troell
Actors: Susan Hampshire, Alf Hellberg, Kristina Kamnert-Suneson, Staffan Liljander
Plot: Magnus is divorced and has an affair with an art teacher at the school where he works. When he thinks she's pregnant, he is worried because he is in love with another woman.
